attributes.action: take serious notice of the petitions listed here.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, are so disillusioned by a Prime Minister who can agree to a fantastic opportunity such as this to create petitions online to allow the public's views to be heard, but can then ignore the voice of 2 million plus on one topic, rendering this site pointless.
We feel so strongly that we cannot consider his party democratic and therefore can no longer support his party unless changes are made.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
